FOR TO ME TO LIVE IS CHRIST, AND TO DIE IS GAIN
PHILIPPIANS 1 : 21
IN LOVING MEMORY OF
Shanthi
M.A, B. LIT., B. ED., B.SC BOTANY
16 June, 1972 - 13 Oct, 2025
Fondly Remembered by:
Husband: J. Stanley Deva Priyam
Son: S. Ebenezer
Daughter: S. Praislin Gifty
Family Members, friends and Relatives..
Prayer for the departed soul will be held on:
25 Oct, 2025
05.30 pm
RAJAMANI MAHAL, OPP. C.S.I CHURCH, CHITTOOR ROAD, SHOLINGHUR.
